**Welcome**

We are so glad you are here!

This app is your partner every step of the way as you deliver the @global.programme_name programme.

**Create & manage parent groups**

Easily create parent groups and keep everything organized.

You can run the programme with one group—or many!

**Share pre-drafted messages**

Deliver chat sessions through pre-drafted  messages that guide meaningful conversations.

Everything you need is built right in.

**Share reports & follow up**

Track sessions, share reports, and follow up—quickly and easily.

See how each group is doing and support those who need it, all in just a few taps.

**Explore helpful resources**

Access a growing library of tips, tools, and activities to help you feel confident and ready for any session.
